评论详情: These are definitely a must have for Fall/Winter months! They fit true to size, the fabric is so soft, and a great price point, I love the color and they go with everything! A great classic staple!

I have been looking for the perfect flat for some time and here it is! They are stylish, comfortable and the sole is flexible. I walk a lot. I normally wear running shoes while walking. But there are times when I want to dress up a bit then end up walking and these are comfortable enough to walk in. I wear them for work. They are the perfect business casual shoe. My feet are slightly wide, so most ballet flats don’t cover my feet properly and they look sloppy. These flats cover just enough. I plan to purchase several more colors.

评论概述: Green satin flat criss cross straps ballet shoes
评论详情: These green satin shoes are so pretty, soft and fit my foot perfect. So comfortable!!!!!! I had to tighten one of the straps. I wore with a pair of socks as pictured in FP. I will be buying more colors. My feet are in heaven with these shoes. Feels so good on my foot. I have narrow feet size 8 perfect fit. Great quality. Good buy!
A little on the wider side. But extremely comfortable. They are soft in the inside. Perfect for fall.

I tried a few brands of ballet flats. These are my winners!  These are comfortable with some padding inside, non-irritating straps and no need to break them in. They don’t provide support, but they don’t rub on my feet and cause blisters either. I have worn them for 2mile+ walks without issues. Though there’s no treads on the bottom, a rubber-type coating to the heel thoughtfully keeps them from being slippy and provides traction. Very flexible, they move with your feet. The rounded toe-box doesn’t pinch and provides wiggle room. The style is super-cute and the straps are adjustable. I have them in several colors and fabrics and they are all beautiful and all soft inside. I was always obsessed with ballerinas as a kid, so these make my inner child smile! A bit pricier than some alternatives but worth it for the wearability and pretty look. True to size.
